# `ProvisionInfo` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| time | `string` | No | The time at which this phone was provisioned. Date time is represented as an ISO-8601 string. For example: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss[.mmm]Z |
| source | `string` | No | The source of the provisioning |
| errorInfo | `string` | No | The error information from the provision process, if any |
